lead_paragraph: The Trump Organization said it is planning a $200 million redevelopment of the iconic Old Post Office Building in Washington, D.C., into a luxury hotel.

headline.main: Trump Unveils $200 Million Plan to Convert D.C. Landmark Into Hotel
headline.print_headline: Trump Unveils $200 Million Plan to Convert D.C. Landmark Into Hotel

snippet: The Trump Organization said it is planning a $200 million redevelopment of the iconic Old Post Office Building in Washington, D.C., into a luxury hotel....
